name: BudgetCraft
description:
Do you want to play Minecraft but don't have the money for Minecarft? Well then try BudgetCraft! BudgetCraft is a barebones version of 2D Minecraft that was made in 12 hours!

Controls:

left-click - place block

right-click - destroy block

a - move right

d - move left

a (hold) + space (press) = jump left

d (hold) + space (press) = jump right

1 to 9 - Corresponding inventory slot
